text: 27.34 Sng 69.21, Mat 27.48 Pen man anɨb ak amjakɨl, bɨ chɨm kadɨŋ gep okok kɨli malasin sɨlek27.34 Bɨ gos nɨgep ogɨnap, kɨli anɨgɨl gos nepal, bɨ chɨm kadɨŋ gep okok kɨli malasin sɨlek Jisas nop ñɨlak ak, ne ñɨbek yul nop ak kul gaŋ agɨl ñɨlak. ak sek, ñɨg wayn ak sek, tɨg adɨk madɨk gɨl, Jisas nop ñelak, ne ñɨb nɨŋɨd kelɨgak.
